scripts/bsub_ldmx_app.py
00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import os
00004 import argparse
00005 import math
00006 import subprocess
00007 import glob
00008 
00009 RUN_SCRIPT = 'run_ldmx_app.py'
00010 
00011 def main():
00012 
00013     parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="Run an ldmx-app job on LSF")
00014     parser.add_argument('-i', nargs=1, help="input string for file glob", required=True)
00015     parser.add_argument('-o', nargs=1, help="string to append to file name")
00016     parser.add_argument('-t', nargs=1, help="recon python template file", required=True)
00017     parser.add_argument('-d', nargs=1, help="output directory", required=True)
00018     parser.add_argument('-x', action='store_true', help="enable dry run with no job submission", required=False)
00019     parser.add_argument('-s', action='store_true', help="skip job if output file already exists", required=False)
00020     args = parser.parse_args()
00021 
00022     input_pattern = args.i[0]
00023     if args.o is not None:
00024         output_append = args.o[0]
00025     else:
00026         output_append = "recon"
00027     output_dir = os.path.abspath(args.d[0])
00028     template_file = os.path.abspath(args.t[0])
00029     skip_existing = args.s
00030     dryrun = args.x
00031 
00032     input_glob = glob.glob('%s*.root' % (input_pattern))
00033 
00034     input_files = []
00035     for i in input_glob:
00036         if not os.path.splitext(os.path.basename(i))[0].endswith(output_append):
00037             input_files.append(i)
00038 
00039     if len(input_glob) == 0:
00040         raise Exception("ERROR: No input files found matching '%s'." % (input_pattern))
00041 
00042     exe, err = subprocess.Popen(['which', RUN_SCRIPT], stdout=subprocess.PIPE).communicate()
00043     if 'no %s in' % RUN_SCRIPT in exe:
00044         raise Exception("ERROR: The %s script was not found!  (Is it in the path?)" % RUN_SCRIPT)
00045     exe = exe[:-1]
00046 
00047     submitted = 0
00048     for input_file in input_files:                
00049         output_file = os.path.splitext(os.path.basename(input_file))[0] + "_" + output_append
00050         log_file = os.path.join(output_dir, output_file + ".log")
00051         input_path = os.path.abspath(input_file)
00052         if not (skip_existing and os.path.exists(os.path.join(output_dir, output_file + ".root"))):
00053             if os.path.exists(log_file):
00054                 subprocess.Popen('rm %s' % log_file, shell=True).wait()
00055             cmd = 'bsub -W %d:0 -q long -o %s -e %s python %s -o %s.root -i %s -t %s -d %s' % \
00056                     (12, log_file, log_file, exe, output_file, input_path, template_file, output_dir)
00057             print cmd
00058             if not dryrun:
00059                 subprocess.Popen(cmd, shell=True).wait()
00060                 submitted += 1
00061         else:
00062             print "Skipping submission for '%s' which already exists in '%s'." % (output_file, output_dir)
00063                 
00064     if dryrun:
00065         print "\nWARNING: Dry run was enabled.  No jobs were submitted!"
00066     else:
00067         print "\nSubmitted %d LSF jobs." % submitted
00068 
00069 if __name__ == '__main__' :
00070     main()
